title: Megan’s Mind
text:
BUILDING IN PROGRESS

” Sometimes shit happens.
Think like a dung beetle does,
and just roll with it. “

title: Megan Jane Lewis
text:
Postdoctoral research assistant at Harper Adams University with a focus on farm data.
When not fixing bugs in R code, I enjoy hunting for real life “bugs” - especially dung beetles!
Avid plant mother


University of Western Australia, Perth | Perth, WA | PhD in Biological Sciences | Jan 2020 - Dec 2023
Harper Adams University | Edgmond, Shropshire, UK
MSc Entomology | Sept 2017 - Aug 2018
BSc (Hons) Wildlife Conservation with Natural Resources Management | Sept 2013 - Jul 2017
